segments.text: You don't look too well . What's going on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just lost my job . I'm just worried about how I'm going to pay the bills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . Have you been looking for another job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just started , but the job market is very bad right now . I'm not optimistic about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's tough . What does your wife think about this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She's trying to be supportive , but I can tell she is very worried about our financial situation as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have some friends who might be able to help you find a job . I'll see what they can do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . In the meantime , don't try to worry so much . You'll get through this .
segments.speaker: S1
